Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails for urgent requests or updates. Review meeting notes from last week regarding EHR data collection and influenza trend analysis project.
Review project documentation, including the scope of work and requirements related to data quality metrics. Refresh my understanding of the data flow and involved systems.
Start defining initial data quality metrics for EHR data related to influenza tracking. Focus on completeness, accuracy, and consistency. Draft a list of potential metrics.
Research industry best practices and regulatory requirements for data quality in healthcare, specifically related to influenza tracking. Check for relevant guidelines and standards.
Refine the list of data quality metrics based on research and project requirements. Prioritize metrics that are most critical for accurate influenza trend analysis.
Prepare a draft document outlining the proposed data quality metrics, including definitions, measurement methods, and acceptance criteria. Share with @da-1 and @da-2 for their input.
Email @da-1 and @da-2 to schedule a brief meeting tomorrow morning to discuss the data quality metrics document. Topic: Data Quality Metrics Review
Begin researching existing tools and techniques for measuring data quality within our EHR system. Explore potential options for automated data quality monitoring.
Document findings from tool research, including potential costs, benefits, and implementation challenges. Note any gaps in existing capabilities.
Wrap up for the day. Organize notes and prioritize tasks for tomorrow.
